cities.name: Sydney, Australia
cities.description: A vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge.

cities.name: Melbourne, Australia
cities.description: A cultural hub famous for its art, food, and diverse neighborhoods.

cities.name: Tokyo, Japan
cities.description: A bustling metropolis blending tradition and modernity, famous for its cherry blossoms and rich culture.

cities.name: Kyoto, Japan
cities.description: Known for its historic temples, gardens, and traditional tea houses.

cities.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
cities.description: A lively city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant carnival celebrations, and iconic landmarks.

cities.name: São Paulo, Brazil
cities.description: The financial hub with diverse culture, arts, and a vibrant nightlife.

cities.name: Rome, Italy
cities.description: The capital city known for its rich history, ancient ruins, and vibrant street life.

cities.name: Venice, Italy
cities.description: A romantic city built on canals, famous for its gondolas and Renaissance art.

temples.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
temples.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and the largest religious monument in the world.

temples.name: Taj Mahal, India
temples.description: An iconic symbol of love and a masterpiece of Mughal architecture.

beaches.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
beaches.description: An island known for its stunning turquoise waters and luxurious overwater bungalows.

beaches.name: Copacabana Beach, Brazil
beaches.description: A famous beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, with a vibrant atmosphere and scenic views.

places.name: Maasai Mara National Reserve, Kenya
places.description: World-renowned for its Great Migration, the Mara offers one of the best safari experiences on the continent. Expect incredible sightings of lions, cheetahs, and wildebeests.

places.name: Zanzibar, Tanzania
places.description: A tropical paradise known for its white sand beaches, historic Stone Town, and Swahili culture.

places.name: Bwindi Impenetrable Forest, Uganda
places.description: Home to nearly half the world’s mountain gorillas, Bwindi offers unforgettable trekking adventures.

places.name: Lalibela, Ethiopia
places.description: Famous for its rock-hewn churches carved into red volcanic rock, a marvel of medieval engineering and spirituality.

places.name: Mount Kenya, Kenya
places.description: Africa’s second-highest peak offers alpine climbing, scenic hikes, and diverse flora and fauna.

places.name: Virunga National Park, DRC
places.description: Africa’s oldest national park, home to mountain gorillas, volcanoes, and diverse landscapes.

places.name: Loango National Park, Gabon
places.description: A rare place where you can see elephants, buffaloes, and hippos on the beach, along with rich marine life.

places.name: Dzanga-Sangha Reserve, Central African Republic
places.description: A biodiversity hotspot famous for forest elephants and lowland gorillas, with strong community conservation programs.

places.name: Odzala-Kokoua National Park, Republic of Congo
places.description: A pristine rainforest offering remote safaris and unique sightings of forest elephants and gorillas.

places.name: Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe/Zambia
places.description: One of the world’s largest waterfalls, locally known as “The Smoke That Thunders.” A must-see natural wonder.

places.name: Okavango Delta, Botswana
places.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its seasonal floodplains and exceptional wildlife safaris.

places.name: Bazaruto Archipelago, Mozambique
places.description: Stunning coral islands with crystal-clear waters, perfect for snorkeling, diving, and relaxation.

places.name: Namib Desert, Namibia
places.description: Famous for its towering red dunes at Sossusvlei and dramatic desert landscapes.

places.name: Table Mountain, South Africa
places.description: Iconic flat-topped mountain in Cape Town offering panoramic views and accessible hiking trails.

places.name: Lake Malawi, Malawi
places.description: Known as the "Calendar Lake," it features vibrant freshwater fish species and relaxing beaches.
